CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleTriggerEnterEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code: -- Parameters local TriggerBodyEntity = event.TriggerBodyEntity -------------------------------------------------------- if TriggerBodyEntity.Id == _UserService.LocalPlayer.Id then self.Entity.Enable = false TriggerBodyEntity.GetMmapComponent:AddMmap() TriggerBodyEntity.GetMmapComponent:SaveMmap() end
